announcementsText: Let's connect and get to know each other. We're a community of people who love to play TCG. We're here to help each other, share our knowledge, and learn from each other. Whether you're a seasoned player or just starting out, we welcome you to join us.
tradeText: Trade! Leave your wishlist of cards so others can comment and connect with youto set up trades.
ideasFeedbackText: This website is a fully open source work in progress. We're always looking for ways to improve the experience. If you have any ideas or feedback, please let us know!
